text.div:
Release Date: 2014-12-11

OID for code system: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.60

OID for value set: 2.16.840.1.113883.1.11.12249 (this is the value set that includes the entire code system)

Description

A value representing the method of expression of the language.
Example:Expressed spoken, expressed written, expressed signed, received spoken, received written, received signed.
OpenIssue: Description copied from Concept Domain of same name. Must be verified.

LevelCodeDisplayDefinition
1ESGN Expressed signed
1ESP Expressed spoken
1EWR Expressed written
1RSGN Received signed
1RSP Received spoken
1RWR Received written

name: v3 Code System LanguageAbilityMode
description:
A value representing the method of expression of the language.  Example:
Expressed spoken, expressed written, expressed signed, received spoken, received written, received signed.  OpenIssue:
Description copied from Concept Domain of same name.  Must be verified.
